name: shire
content:

[ C ] UK old use a county, now used in combination in the names of many British counties: Yorkshire Oxfordshire the shires [ plural ] UK
the central rural counties of England, such as Leicestershire, Nottinghamshire, and Derbyshire: The county is called 'the rose of the shires'.
